quotes: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
Bruce Lee
Lost time is like a run in a stocking. It always gets worse.
Anne Morrow Lindbergh
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
Charles Darwin
Never waste your time it is to precious. There are never any guarantees we will have tomorrow.
Catherine Pulsifer
I cannot understand and realize that many people have time to waste their time.
Ehsan Sehgal
He did not waste time in a vain search for a place in history
Dejan Stojanovic
If you misuse your youth, you get misery when you are old.
Amit Kalantri
Time = life; therefore, waste your time and waste your life, or master your time and master your life
Alan Lakein
One thing is for sure, procrastinators waste the most precious asset a human can have: time.
K. Collins
Your time is way too valuable to be wasting on people that can't accept who you are.
Turcois Ominek
In every tick of the clock a tiny door slams shut; in the following tock is heard the turn of the lock.
Garry Fitchett
It is named the 'Web' for good reason.
David Foster Wallace
